scripts.build-major: node update-version major && react-scripts build && sw-precache --config=sw-precache-config.js
scripts.build-minor: node update-version minor && react-scripts build && sw-precache --config=sw-precache-config.js
scripts.build-patch: node update-version patch && react-scripts build && sw-precache --config=sw-precache-config.js
scripts.deploy-dev: npm run build && firebase deploy --only hosting:dev
